name: WitchRL
description:
This is my 7DRL entry. It's about creating your own spells using small pieces. Inspired by Noita's spell system.

This game didn't go quite as well as i had hoped. I severely underestimated how long a week was, so i programmed things as if it was a 48 hour jam, resulting in horrendous code. Because of that i couldn't really fix the bugs or add the QoL changes i wanted to, and that's not to mention the game design issues. But at least i got something done.
